text:
Maria Celeste Nardini (28 September 1942 – 2 September 2020) was an Italian Communist Refoundation Party politician. She was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1994 to 2006. Between 2006 to 2008, she was a member of the Senate. Nardini was born in Bari, Italy.
Nardini died on 2 September 2020 in Bari, aged 77.
